hanzi-su-wiki:
泣

Значения

Плакать

Мнемоника

  • Плач — в глазах стоит 立 вода 氵.

  • "Человек стоит 立 и плачет."
purpleculture_pinyin:
qì
to sob
рыдать
rtega_mnemonic:
泣泣RScry, sob, weep
  • water 氵 standing 立 in the eyes
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 立 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
哭泣 [ kū qì ]: to weep
抽泣 [ chōu qì ]: to sob spasmodically
可歌可泣 [ kě gē kě qì ]: lit. you can sing or you can cry (idiom); fig. deeply moving; happy and sad; inspiring and tragic
啜泣 [ chuò qì ]: to sob
悲泣 [ bēi qì ]: to weep with grief
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 氵 [ shuǐ ] water
    • 立 [ lì ] to stand; to establish, to set up
heisig_chinese_memo: Guys have two ways of watering when they are standing, the less common one is crying/weeping.
heisig_constituent: cry, water, water droplets, water pistol, vase, stand up
heisig_story: One cries and cries until one is standing up knee-deep in water (or until one has a vase-full of water).
koohiiStory1: Guys have two ways of watering when they are standing, the less common one is crying.
koohiiStory2: She stood up to leave the room when her eyes started to water...
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: If you stand in front of a tsunami, you’re going to cry. That tsunami is going to hit you hard, and rip you right off the ground on which you stand. And then you’ll cry like a little baby.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine getting hit with the full force of a tsunami. It slams into you and crushes every bone in your body. It hurts so much you cry.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You know what else can make you cry? A Nazi (な). Nazis are mean, mean people, much worse than tsunamis. Nazis are bad news. Imagine a Nazi surfboarding on top of that tsunami that just hit you and made you cry. I imagine there’s nothing worse in this world than that.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture this mean Nazi riding toward you atop of this tsunami wave. Hear him screaming, “Heil!” just before the tsunami wave crashes over you. Rotten Nazi.
Ru_Notes: Сравни: 鳴 (なく、メイ чирикать, сверчать, кричать по-звериному, петь по-птичьи).
Kanshudo_mnemonic: standing (立) in water (氵) = crying
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Guys have two ways of watering when they are standing, the less common one is crying/weeping.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " water ", " stand up " sound, the original meaning is silent tears or crying in a low voice. "Shuowen": "Silent tears say weep. From the water, stand up sound." "Yi‧ Tun": "Win the enemy, or drum or stop, or cry or sing."

" Weeping " can mean tears. Han Liuxiang "Nine Sighs: Sorrowful": "The tears flow together, and the tears flow down."

" Weeping " also means sadness. Han Yangxiong's "Tai Xuan‧ Costume": "The second eight seasons broadcast the track of the way of weeping." Fan Wang's note: "Weep, worry too."

" Weeping " also describes the appearance of a violent storm. "Han Shu-Yang Xiong Chuan 1": "The Chen of the Huhu, from Hengjiao, weeping and resolute, stunned, raging, and the sky is moving." Yan Shigu's note: "Weeping, stubborn wind." Looks too."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " water " and " standing ", the original meaning is silent tears or crying in a low voice.
humanum_full_description:
從「水」，「立」聲，本義為無聲流淚或低聲而哭。《說文》：「無聲出涕曰泣。从水，立聲。」 《易‧屯》：「得敵，或鼓或罷，或泣或歌。」

　　「泣」可表示眼淚。漢劉向《九嘆‧憂苦》：「涕流交集兮，泣下漣漣。」

　　「泣」還表示憂傷。漢揚雄《太玄‧裝》：「次八季仲播軌泣于之道。」范望注：「泣，憂也。」

　　「泣」亦形容暴風迅猛的樣子。《漢書‧揚雄傳上》：「虓虎之陳，從橫膠輵，猋泣雷厲，驞駍駖磕，洶洶旭旭，天動地岋。」顏師古注：「泣，猋風疾貌也。」
humanum_short_description: 從「水」，「立」聲，本義為無聲流淚或低聲而哭。

從「 水 」，「 立 」聲，本義為無聲流淚或低聲而哭。《說文》：「無聲出涕曰泣。从水，立聲。」 《易‧屯》：「得敵，或鼓或罷，或泣或歌。」 「 泣 」可表示眼淚。漢劉向《九嘆‧憂苦》：「涕流交集兮，泣下漣漣。」 「 泣 」還表示憂傷。漢揚雄《太玄‧裝》：「次八季仲播軌泣于之道。」范望注：「泣，憂也。」 「 泣 」亦形容暴風迅猛的樣子。《漢書‧揚雄傳上》：「虓虎之陳，從橫膠輵，猋泣雷厲，驞駍駖磕，洶洶旭旭，天動地岋。」顏師古注：「泣，猋風疾貌也。」
From " water", " stand up" sound, the original meaning is silent tears or crying in a low voice. "Shuowen": "Silent tears say weep. From the water, stand up sound." "Yi‧ Tun": "Win the enemy, or drum or stop, or cry or sing." " Weeping" can mean tears. Han Liuxiang "Nine Sighs: Sorrowful": "The tears flow together, and the tears flow down." " Weeping" also means sadness. Han Yangxiong's "Tai Xuan‧ Costume": "The second eight seasons broadcast the track of the way of weeping." Fan Wang's note: "Weep, worry too." " Weeping" also describes the appearance of a violent storm. "Han Shu-Yang Xiong Chuan 1": "The Chen of the Huhu, from Hengjiao, weeping and resolute, stunned, raging, and the sky is moving." Yan Shigu's note: "Weeping, stubborn wind." Looks too."

泣字的基本解释

泣
qì
小声哭：泣诉（哭着控诉）。抽泣。哭泣。涕泣。
眼泪：饮泣。泣下如雨。泣血（ａ．流眼泪没有声，像出血那样；ｂ．指在丧事期）。
哭

泣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qì］
［《廣韻》去急切，入緝，溪。］
(1)无声流泪或低声而哭。
(2)眼泪。
(3)忧伤。
(4)星座名。共二星，属虚宿。
[②]［lì］
［《集韻》力入切，入緝，來。］
形容暴风迅猛的样子。
[③]［sè］
［《字彙補》色入切］
通“澀1”。
涩滞不畅。

泣字的英文翻译

◎ 泣
sob, tears, weep

泣字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　泣； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页617第09
【廣韻】去急切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】乞及切，?音湇。【說文】無聲出涕也。【徐鉉曰】泣，哭之細也。【禮·檀弓】泣血三年。　又【集韻】力入切，音立。猋泣，疾貌。　又與澀通。血凝不消也。【素問】寒氣容于背兪之脈，則血脈泣。

泣字的起名意思

暂无。

weep
Basic explanation of words
weep
qì
Weep in a low voice: Weeping (crying and complaining). Sobbing. cry. Tears.
Tears: Weeping. Weeping like rain. Weeping blood (a. Tears are silent, like bleeding; b. Refers to the funeral period).
cry
weep

["Guangyun" goes eagerly, enters the arrest, Xi. ]

(2) Tears.
(3) Sadness.
(4) Constellation name. A total of two stars, it is a virtual place.
[②]［lì］
["Jiyun" cuts hard, enters the arrest, come. ]
Describe the appearance of the violent storm.
[③] [sè]
["The Complement of the Words and the Complement" of Colors]
Pass "Astringent 1".
Stagnation is not smooth.

形声字。水(?)表意,篆书之形像流水,隶、楷书之形像水滴,表示眼泪是液体;立(h)表声,“立”是人站立形,表示
泪是人眼睛流出的水。本义是无声或低声哭。
①无声或低声地哭:抽~「哭~|~不成声。2眼泪:
饮~「涕~1~下沾襟。
~诉 ~血 ~~下如雨 哀~暗~ 悲~ 啜~
掩~ 可歌可~向隅而~
泣
qì
粒|泣|泣
Пиктофонетические символы.
Вода (?) Означает, что сценарий печати похож на проточную воду, а официальный сценарий и обычный сценарий похожи на капли воды, что указывает на то, что слезы жидкие; Ли (h) указывает звук, "立" - форма человека стоя, что означает, что слезы - это вода, текущая из человеческих глаз.
Первоначальное значение - тихий плач или плач шепотом.
①Плачь тихо или тихо: дым ~ "Плач ~ | ~ Без звука. 2 Слезы:
Напиток ~ "Галстук ~ 1 ~ Ся Чжаньцзинь.
~ Su ~ Blood ~~ Дождь и грустно ~ Dark ~ Sorrow ~ Глоток ~
Обложка ~ Ты умеешь петь ~ Сян Юэр ~
плакать
Зерно | плакать | плакать
qì
1) беззвучно плакать; лить слёзы; со слезами, слёзно
泣不成声 неслышно плакать
泣谏 слёзно укорять, со слезами обличать (государя)
泣泪 лить слёзы, беззвучно плакать
泣珠 плакать жемчужинами (о сказочных персонажах)
2) оплакивать
泣杖 оплакивать посох (матери, которая уже не может бить им с прежней силой — о почтительном сыне)
3) заставлять плакать; до слёз растрогать
泣鬼神 заставить плакать злых и добрых духов

泣

Значения

Плакать

Мнемоника

  • Плач — в глазах стоит 立 вода 氵.

  • "Человек стоит 立 и плачет."
Radicals: 氵, 立  (tsunami, stand)
Meaning Mnemonic
If you stand in front of a tsunami, you’re going to cry. That tsunami is going to hit you hard, and rip you right off the ground on which you stand. And then you’ll cry like a little baby.
Imagine getting hit with the full force of a tsunami. It slams into you and crushes every bone in your body. It hurts so much you cry.
Reading Mnemonic
You know what else can make you cry? A Nazi (な). Nazis are mean, mean people, much worse than tsunamis. Nazis are bad news. Imagine a Nazi surfboarding on top of that tsunami that just hit you and made you cry. I imagine there’s nothing worse in this world than that.
Picture this mean Nazi riding toward you atop of this tsunami wave. Hear him screaming, “Heil!” just before the tsunami wave crashes over you. Rotten Nazi.
